title: Ep. 262 "Is Having An Orgasmless Relationship Really That Bad?"
description:
Cocktail: WITCH'S BREW

1 ½ OUNCES OF MIDORI
1 ½ OUNCES OF TRIP SEC
1 OUNCE OF FRESH LEMON JUICE
1 CUBE OF DRY ICE


Instructions:
Add the Midori, Cointreau, and lemon juice to a cocktail mixing glass (or cocktail shaker). Add 2 handfuls of regular ice cubes and stir until cold. Strain the drink into a lowball glass. Garnish with a cocktail cherry.

Using tongs (do not touch the dry ice!), add a 1/2-inch to 1-inch chunk of dry ice to the glass, which will sink to the bottom and immediately make a smoking effect. The ice cube will disappear in about 5 minutes. Do not drink the dry ice! Wait until the cube disappears before enjoying your drink (or you can take sips with the dry ice in the bottom).
